summary: Darts is a type of throwing game where darts are thrown towards a circular target held on a wall.
full_text: Darts is a form of throwing game in which small missiles are thrown at a circular target  fixed to a wall. Though various boards and rules have been used in the past, the term "darts" usually now refers to a standardised game involving a specific board design and set of rules. As well as being a professional competitive sport, darts is a traditional pub game, commonly played in the United Kingdom, across the Commonwealth, the Netherlands, Germany, Belgium, Republic of Ireland, the Scandinavian countries, the United States, and elsewhere.
title: Darts
